skins.shipDescription: The fourth ship of Mutsuki class destroyer ¡ª Uzuki
skins.selfIntroduction: I¡¯m Uzuki from the 30th Destroyer Division. Hmm¡­ where is everyone... I'm good at both defense and offense. What¡¯s more, I am the most hard-working destroyer among my sisters. Hey Commander, while I was introducing myself, I seem to have lost my card!
skins.acquisition: Sooo, are you the Commander? I am Uzuki. You were looking for me, right? You sure it's me, right?! If I¡¯m mistaken, that¡¯ll be awkward¡­
skins.login: Ahhh, where¡¯d you go Commander? I was scared all by myself!
skins.details: Commander, bad news! There¡¯s a cockroach, please help me get rid of it!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Although submarines are terrifying, but I¡¯m not afraid of airplanes!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Oh no, Commander, my torpedo is missing!! Hmm, it¡¯s behind me?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander!! Just now when I ran over to you, the flower vase fell to the ground, was it haunted?
skins.secretaryTouch: Wahahaha, incoming submarine!! ¡­ huh? It¡¯s the Commander.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, how come after telling my sisters what you did, they all came rushing over to you?

skins.shipDescription: *yawn* ... Kisaragi, Mutsuki, let's take a nap together... Commander? Do you want to join too?
skins.acquisition: *yawn* ... Kisaragi, Mutsuki, let's take a nap together... Commander? Do you want to join too?
skins.details: Commander, I had a dream. Everyone was playing together hand-in-hand, and nobody was fighting! It was really fun!
skins.secretaryIdle1: It's no good that Commander does all the work while I sleep... I'll also help... Zzzzzz...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, want to play house? Yes, these are plushies of Mutsuki and Kisaragi!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, come here if you're tired! You can have half the pillow!
skins.secretaryTouch: Ehehe~ Commander, your hand is so warm! Commander, sing me a lullaby~
